== BigBlueButton Server ==

Note: To add a new application to the Red5 Server follow the instruction provided at "Red5 Documentation" [http://red5world.com/workshop/red5.pdf], "How to create new application in Red4" section. 

1. New applications should be created in the following directory C:\source\bigbluebutton-server\webapps\myapps.

2. WEB-INF folder also should be created within myapps folder, C:\source\bigbluebutton-server\webapps\myapps\WEB-INF.

3. Three configuration files (web.xml, red3-web.xml, and red5-web.properties) should be added to myapps\WEB-INF folder. 

4. red5-web.properties file contains the context path  and the local host for the new application so it should be setup as follows, 
{{{
      webapp.contextPath=/vcr
      webapp.virtualHosts=*,localhost, 127.0.0.1
}}}

Also edit the line to point to the path for the new application as follows,
{{{
     <bean id="web.handler" 
	    class="org.bigbluebuttonproject.myapps.Application"
		singleton="true" />
}}}

5. When a new component added to the project, there are certain files need to be edited:
 * BigBlueButton-server/build.xml as follows: 
   * add the following lines in the build-demo section   
               
{{{ 
     <build-demo name="myapps">
	<copy-assets>
		<logback webapp="myapps"/>
	</copy-assets>
     </build-demo> 
}}}

 * Add the path for the classes folder for your module or components in the section
   {{{
   <!-- libraries and classes needed for building BigBlueButtonProject -->
   }}}
   add the line 
   {{{
       <fileset dir="${webapps.build.dir}/myapps/WEB-INF/classes"/>
   }}}
  
 * In the  section of
{{{
  <!-- war up BigBlueButtonProject-->
}}}
  add the line 
  {{{ 
     <compile-wardemo name="myapps"/>
  }}}

 * In the section of 
{{{
    <!-- create jar files for BigBlueButtonProject -->
}}}
 add the following line
{{{
   <compile-jardemo name="myapps"/>
}}}

6. Add logback.html file to the new module directory. and edit the line
{{{
<appender-ref ref="myapps" />
}}}
{{{
<logger name="org.blindsideproject.myapps">
}}}

7. Add the files (red5-web.properties, red5-web.xml, and web.xml) to the directory "project_root\webapps\mtapps\WEB-INF\".

8. Edit the lines 
{{{
<context-param>
		<param-name>webAppRootKey</param-name>
		<param-value>/myapps</param-value>
	</context-param>
}}}
in the web.xml file in the "project_root\webapps\myapps\WEB-INF\" folder.

9. Edit the line
{{{
<bean id="web.handler" 
	    class="org.bigbluebuttonproject.myapps"
}}}
in the red5-web.xml file in the "project_root\webapps\myapps\WEB-INF\" folder.

== BigBlueButton Server Tasks==

The BigBlueButton server commands cdn be found in the build.xml file in "C:\source\bigbluebutton-server" folder.

{{{
<target name="prepare" description="Setup the directories for building">
}}}

{{{
<target name="retrieve" unless="library.installed" description="Retrieves the libraries if needed">
}}}

{{{
<target name="ivyclear" description="Clears out the Ivy cache">
}}}

{{{
<target name="compile" depends="-library.check, -java6.check, prepare" description="Compiles the server">
}}}

{{{
<target name="compile_core" if="java6.installed" description="Build server core">
}}}

{{{
<target name="compile_demos" description="Build demo apps">
}}}
{{{
<target name="war_demos" description="Build wars for demo apps" depends="compile_demos">
}}}

{{{
<target name="javadoc" description="Generate JavaDoc">
}}}

{{{
<target name="jar" description="Make Archive" depends="compile">
}}}

{{{
<target name="dist" description="Make Binary distribution" depends="clean, jar">
}}}

{{{
<target name="dist-installer" description="Make Installer distribution" depends="ivyclear, dist, javadoc">
}}}

{{{
<target name="dist-archive" depends="dist-installer" description="Create archive file for distribution">
}}}

{{{
<target name="dist-windows" description="Create Windows installer">
}}}

{{{
<target name="dist-debian" description="Create Debian package" depends="dist-installer">
}}}

{{{
<target name="dist-redhat" description="Create Redhat installer" depends="dist-installer">
}}}

{{{
<target name="server" depends="compile" description="Compile and start the server">
}}}

{{{
<target name="shutdown">
}}}

{{{
<target name="udp_server" depends="compile" description="Compile and start experimental UDP server">
}}}

{{{
<target name="run-tests" depends="compile_tests" description="Run JUnit tests and generate HTML reports">
}}}

{{{
<target name="compile_tests" description="Compiles junit test classes">
}}}

{{{
<target name="webwar" description="Make Web Archive" depends="compile_war">
}}}

{{{
<target name="remotejar" description="Creates a jar that may be deployed with remote applications" depends="compile">
}}}

{{{
<target name="all" depends="clean, prepare, compile, jar, javadoc" description="Run all server tasks"/>
}}}
